channel.description: News and updates about the MEDS program

item.title: Welcome to Fall 2023
item.dc:creator: Okan Bulut
item.description: Welcoming MEDS students to the Fall semester with a special gathering at Rosso Pizzeria. With the changing colors of campus serving as a poignant backdrop, we share our excitement for the academic year ahead and offer our sincere wishes for the success of every student.

item.title: Congratulations to Recent MEDS Graduates!
item.dc:creator: Okan Bulut
item.description: A hearty congratulations to our recent graduates for completing their PhD in the MEDS program. Check out the details here.

item.title: Welcome to the New MEDS Website
item.dc:creator: Okan Bulut
item.description: Have you checked out our new website yet? Weâ€™re excited to announce that the new MEDS website has been launched, built from the ground up with a fresh look! Check out the details here.
